attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This isnt what I wanted for my children, this isnt what our parents, grandparents fought for---the countries a mess and you are being traitorous to us all--so I will fight you for it---I am not so fit so it could go either way---come on Gordo , square go ---winner takes all

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
